New Records: Jaylen Brown scored a season-high 44 points and became the fourth player in franchise history to have at least 40 points and at least four steals in a regular-season game.
Key Match Events: Boston Celtics scored 142 points, the most given up by the Pacers in a game this season.
Pre-Game Insights: Defense was lacking from Indiana on Friday.
Post-Match Reflections: Indiana head coach Rick Carlisle stated, "We just have to play better.... We're going to, obviously, have to be a lot better with everything on Sunday."
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the third and final game between the teams during the regular season.
Others: The Pacers were outrebounded 52-39 in the game.
